Recipe.title: Teriyaki Sauce
Recipe.Description: One night, we started making Teriyaki chicken, then we found we didn't have any Teriyaki sauce. So, Ransom did a little research, tried a few things and we came up with this.

section.instruction: Place all ingredients in a small pot and mix.
Heat on medium heat until it comes to a boil.

Notes.note: Due to the high sugar content, this recipe will easily overflow if you let it boil for very long at all.

Modifications.modification: Use ½ Cup Corn Syrup instead of Brown Sugar.
